# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-to-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="16de9-102">向邮件中添加表情符号或 Gif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-102">Add emojis or GIFs to messages</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="16de9-103">答复现有电子邮件或选择 "**新邮件**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16de9-104">选择笑脸</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="16de9-105">在撰写窗口的底部, 打开 "表达式" 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="16de9-106">搜索并选择要插入的表情符号或 GIF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16de9-107">有关详细信息, 请参阅[在 web 上的 Outlook 中自定义电子](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41)邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16de9-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
